text: Brickellia urolepis is a Mexican species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to northeastern Mexico in the states of Coahuila and Nuevo León.Turner, B. L. 1997. The Comps of Mexico: A systematic account of the family Asteraceae, vol. 1 – Eupatorieae. Phytologia Memoirs 11: i–iv, 1–272Tropicos, Brickellia urolepis S.F. Blake Blake, Sydney Fay 1942. Journal of the Washington Academy of Sciences 32: 146-147 description in parallel English + Latin; commentary in English ==References== ==External links== *Photo of herbarium specimen collected in Nuevo León urolepis Category:Flora of Northeastern Mexico Category:Plants described in 1942
title: Brickellia urolepis
